about_the_game:
Aqua Conflict takes you on an exhilarating journey across some of the world's most extreme and stunning environments. Race through the scorching Danakil Depression, dive into the depths of the Mariana Trench, brave the icy expanses of the North Pole, and navigate the vibrant colors of Rainbow Mountain. But the adventure doesn't stop there—experience the rugged beauty of Arizona’s Red Rock Mountains, the dense, mysterious African jungles, the icy wilderness of Greenland, the pristine waters of Niue, the enigmatic statues of Chile’s Easter Island, and the mesmerizing Northern Lights.

Each environment offers its own unique challenges, pushing your racing skills to the limit. Whether you're speeding through narrow canyons, dodging icebergs, or weaving through dense jungle foliage, every race tests your strategy, reflexes, and endurance.

With a wide range of customizable boats at your disposal, you can design and upgrade your vessel to tackle each environment’s specific challenges. Fine-tune your speed, handling, and durability to outmaneuver your rivals and dominate every race.

Aqua Conflict is more than just a racing game—it's an epic adventure that takes you to the planet’s most awe-inspiring and treacherous waters. Are you ready to conquer these extreme environments and become the ultimate boat racing champion? The race of a lifetime awaits! 🌍🚤

name: Aqua Conflict: Canal Carnage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 11400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Not Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 11400
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Not Supported

short_description: Race through extreme environments in Aqua Conflict! Navigate the scorching Danakil Depression, the depths of the Mariana Trench, the icy North Pole, and the vibrant Rainbow Mountain. With a vast selection of boats, conquer the most breathtaking waters on Earth in this thrilling adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*
*languages with full audio support
